author: Giovanni Legorano
title: Italian Political Parties 5 Star and League Strike Deal on Coalition Government
text:
ROME—Two large antiestablishment parties, the League and the 5 Star Movement, struck a deal Thursday evening on reviving a coalition government, according to a 5 Star official, a development that could bring an end to a political crisis that roiled global markets and would deliver a euroskeptic administration to power in the eurozone’s third-largest economy.
The 5 Star Movement, a maverick party that is Italy’s largest political group, and the nativist, hard-right League, agreed to form a government, ending a five-day impasse...
